text: Welcome to the General Dharma circle! Feel free to share your thoughts. Hari Om.
Pranam! Glad to be here. What is everyone's favorite teaching from the Gita?
Welcome yogis! Please share your favorite meditation techniques.
Does anyone have a link to a beautiful rendition of the Hanuman Chalisa?
Let's begin our study of the Upanishads this week. Any initial questions?
